General.Name: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Textile Industry Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes yarns, apparel, and fabrics in Thailand and internationally. The company offers raw fabrics, cotton yarns, blended and synthetic fiber yarns, white fabrics, dyed fabrics, and woven fabrics. It also sells ready-made shirts under the TTI brand name. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand.
General.Address: 385 Moo 1, Soi Bang Make Khao, Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10280
